attributes.action: STOP  Royal Cornwall Hospitals Trust CLOSING facilities at Penzance and Hayle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Cornwall Hospitals Trust have, over the last few years, systematically withdrawn services at West Cornwall and Hayle Hospitals. We respectfully submit that the population spread and poor economic situation demand that full facilities are crucial at these 2 Hospitals and should be restored.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "STOP Royal Cornwall Hospitals Trust CLOSING facilities at Penzance and Hayle."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14648.asp

Prime Minister's Office
